data.text:
David I. Zaret, M.D., M.B.A.

"My fellowship training and specialization ensures my patients receive the latest treatments in both common conditions and complex surgical reconstruction."

BIOGRAPHY

BIOGRAPHY

RECOGNITION

PATIENT REVIEWS

About Dr. Zaret

David I. Zaret, M.D., is one of Long Island’s leading board-certified, fellowship-trained foot and ankle specialists. He possesses extensive expertise in total ankle replacement surgery as well as other more common foot and ankle procedures, such as fusions, tendon repairs and bunion corrections.
